name: Wormhole IT
tag_list: software, argentina, web-conference, elearning, custom-software-development, work-for-hire, webinars, webcast, online-collaboration, web-meetings
overview:
Technologies for online collaboration

At Wormhole IT, we provide innovative products and services to optimize communications, collaboration, online training and business processes. We design creative solutions that focus on scalability, usability and interaction to produce top-quality software.

Wormhole Web Conference (WWC) is a professional platform for distance meetings and events that is 100% Internet-based. With WWC, you can be in touch with collaborators anywhere in the world.

This simple and effective tool allows you to:

* transmit audio and video from your PC
* share presentations and documents
* collaborate via chat
* invite people to meetings without requiring them to download or install software

Wormhole Learning Management System (LMS) is the most comprehensive solution for your distance education and learning programs. It is an integral management tool for classes, courses, events and videoconferencing online. Wormhole LMS allows you to:

* plan and give training sessions and tests
* access study material: documents, images, videos and spreadsheets
* interact with teachers and students through various channels
* participate in debates on internal forums

We have a department that specializes in developing software and graphic design. These can be customized according to your needs. Our team of design and Internet development professionals follows a series of processes to guarantee the quality of the final product for transactional software, Internet portals, virtual communities, business support applications, 3-D animations, and others.

We are known by companies across the world for always meeting deadlines and for optimizing resources within the established budget. In addition, what sets our company apart is our ability to understand business issues and to offer a simple, easy-to-implement technology solution.
